name: Nanny's Journey
description:
"Nanny's Journey" is not for the faint of heart: this platform game, where every jump and every move counts, will challenge you like never before.
Use the Devil's Tail to climb back up through the level, designed to test your dexterity, patience and resilience.
Collecting the ghost bonuses will give you a considerable advantage in completing your journey!

The difficulty will make each success a real victory or not!



Our heroine isn't just any old lady. With her $*&% character, she seizes diabolical power. Her new trump card? An infernal grappling hook to navigate through flames and the abyss!
Join Nanny on her frantic journey and prove that age is just a number.

Download "Nanny's Journey" and plunge into the wildest adventure of your life.
The Devil better watch out, because Nanny's coming, and she's not messing around!
